document.full_text: the los angeles dodgers scored four runs in the seventh inning to beat the san francisco giants 7-5 sunday and give them a 3-1 opening series victory over their arch-rivals.
document.title: dodgers rally in seventh to take opening series against giants
lines_and_colors: the los angeles dodgers scored four runs in the seventh inning to beat the san francisco giants 7-5 sunday and give them a 3-1 opening series victory over their arch-rivals.
